name: Forsaken Rock (GB Studio)
description:
Forsaken Rock

A Gameboy color prototype game in the browser.

Keyboard Controls:

Left - RightArrow-Key AJ, Z BK, X StartEnter SelectShift

Our hero is on a distant planet that has been invaded by evil bubblegum aliens who have trapped Buterflies inside them.

The hero's task is to free the planet from the evil forces.

You can also download the rom.

I'm bug fixing it!
